name: 徐偉峰
objective:
先修課程:4402025或負責教授同意
底盤動力系統，行駛阻力、驅動力、煞車制動傳動等之計算車懸吊系統分析（懸吊系統、汽車垂直振動分析、系統參數調整），汽車轉向系統，ABS 煞車系統，整合系統。
Traction Force, Driving Resistance, Power Balance, Performance Test, Fuel Economy, Engine and Transmission Matching, Braking Performance, Handling, Steering and Ride Characteristics.
schedule:
3.5 Weeks: 充氣輪胎的特徵
5.5 Weeks: 性能的特徵
3 Weeks: 操控特性
1 Weeks: 翻覆性
3 Weeks: 適乘性
=============================
3.5 Weeks: Characteristics of  Pneumatic Tires
5.5 Weeks: Performance Characteristics
3 Weeks: Handling Characteristics
1 Weeks: Rollover
3 Weeks: Ride Characteristics
materials:

T. D. Gillespie, 車輛運動力學, Society of Automotive, 譯者 林筱增。
